mapper.select: select transfersOrderId, pId, unitrequire, num, outWare, inWare,stuta,createtime,createPerson, details from clothesppsdb.transfersorder where transfersOrderId = #{transfersorderid}
select transfersOrderId, pId, unitrequire, num, outWare, inWare,stuta,createtime,createPerson, details from clothesppsdb.transfersorder
mapper.insert: insert into clothesppsdb.transfersorder(transfersOrderId, pId, unitrequire, num, outWare, inWare,stuta,createtime,createPerson, details) values (#{pid}, #{unitrequire}, #{num}, #{outware}, #{inware},#{stuta},#{createtime},#{createPerson}, #{details})
